meanings.sent1: She is a discerning shopper, always choosing the best quality products.
meanings.sent2: The discerning teacher could easily identify the most talented students in the class.
meanings.sent3: The discerning cat only ate the premium cat food, leaving the rest untouched.
meanings.sent4: His discerning eye for art allowed him to spot the masterpiece among the replicas.
meanings.sent5: The discerning detective quickly solved the case with his sharp intuition.

meanings.definition: Able to distinguish or recognize differences
meanings.sent1: The discerning chef could taste the subtle differences in spices in the dish.
meanings.sent2: Only a discerning individual would notice the slight variations in the two paintings.
meanings.sent3: The discerning dog could tell which toy was his favorite from the others.
meanings.sent4: Her discerning palate could detect the unique flavors in the complex dish.
meanings.sent5: The discerning scientist could differentiate between the two nearly identical substances.

meanings.definition: Having or showing keen insight or perception
meanings.sent1: The discerning professor could see through the student's excuses.
meanings.sent2: A discerning reader can understand the deeper meanings hidden in the text.
meanings.sent3: The discerning owl spotted the cleverly camouflaged mouse in the tree.
meanings.sent4: His discerning analysis of the situation led to a successful outcome.
meanings.sent5: The discerning artist captured the essence of emotion in her paintings.
